g.text: LLM interaction starts only after the Questionnaire is
prompting to enrich the first interaction, as it lacks history.
Sends questionnaire details, instructs LLM to follow
to generate example of first communication (it'll be used as
Sends response with example conversation (it will be parsed & inserted
into the next prompt as example of huma-like interaction for LLM).
Responds with a message acting as Wendy persona
(message should have a question-based format, so
that we get to know more about the user).
Responds to the message, protentially asnwering a question.
The general conversation between user & LLM starts now on.
